# 2025 Coding Advent
             
***Note** - This README was generated by './initalizer.py'.


![Demo GIF](./assets/drawio-xmas-tree.gif)

Advent of Code is an Advent calendar of small programming puzzles written by Eric Wastl for a variety of skill levels that can be solved in any programming language.

## Prerequisites
No Prereq's

### System Requirements:
* [git](https://git-scm.com/) >= 2.52.0

## Installation
You can see all of the puzzels at [Advent of Code](https://adventofcode.com/).

No installation should be needed. A copy of the repo can be saved or forked through GitHub.
